nodes.text: The Council Chamber was a room located within the Imperial Palace on Coruscant during the New Republic's control of the complex. Located off of the Grand Corridor, the chamber was used by the New Republic Provisional Council and later the Ruling Council.

The Council Chamber was a chamber used by the New Republic government beginning in 6.5 ABY as the formal meeting chambers of the Provisional Council. A fair sized chamber, the seats in the Council chamber were typically arranged around an oval table at the center of the room, with addition chairs lining the walls for aides and assistants to occupy. The room's seating could be rearranged into a tiers to accommodate larger groups. It was larger then the more cozy Inner Council Chamber, located nearby within the Palace.
